name: Carball 360
description:
Welcome to Carball 360, a game of skill, experience, and a bit of luck.

Carball 360 is a simple game.
There are no skins to buy, there are no glitches to exploit.
There’s an arena, a ball, 2 players, two optional AI and 60 seconds.

There are no assigned goals.
The team that touches the ball last before it scores, scores the goal regardless of what goal they scored on.
This last-touch scoring blurs the line between offensive and defensive roles creating an exciting and different playing experience.

We capped the frames per second (fps) at 90 fps to promote a gameplay of skill.
Who’s the better player, not who has the better computer.

There are no settings to change.
Everyone is playing the EXACT same game.
Same camera angle, same perspective, same everything.

The cars are exactly the same.
Same hitbox, same top-speed available, same everything.

Wins are wins.
Losses are losses.
Ties are meaningless.

Find your play style, find your stance, find your strategy and beat the player in front of you.

Join the beta as we strive to make the best game possible.
